name: Sodal Mela
description: Varun Sharma is an Indian film actor who has starred in commercially successful films including Fukrey, Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon, Dilwale, Fukrey Returns, and Chhichhore.

name: Nakodar Mela
description: The dargah of Baba Murad Shah ji after the death of Sai Laddi Shah Ji was offered to the famous Punjabi singer, Mr. Gurdas Maan Ji who has remained as a sewadaar. Various singers perform at this powerful place and also there is a mela (fair) celebrated regularly in Memory of Baba Murad Shah Ji and Sai Ghulam (Laddi) Shah Ji

name: Shaheedi Jor mela
description: Shaheedi Jor mela, which is held annually in the memory of Shaheed Baba Nihal Singh. The mela is a big attraction in Jalandhar. An annual Mela is held to mark the death anniversary ("Barsi") of the Shaheed Baba Nihal Singh.
